UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Virtual screening of a milk peptide database for the identification of food-derived antimicrobial peptides.
Literature.Author: Liu Y, Eichler J, Pischetsrieder M

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli NEB5alpha(MIC=250µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=250µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6051(MIC=250µg/ml)
